name: formSubmitUrl
description: the URL to call on form submission

name: formSchema
description: the JSON schema of the form

name: formVisualizerOptions
description: the options used by the form visualizer

name: isEditable
description: defines if a form submission can be updated

name: isPrivate
description: specifies if a form template can be displayed to every user

name: enabledUserGroups
description: user groups that will have 'view only' access of the submitted data
